name: RSSNotifier
short: RSSNotifier will notify users about feed updates from aikaterna-cogs's RSS cog.
description: One of the rare cogs from this repo that could actually be considered useful.
install_msg: Thanks for installing RSSNotifier. To opt-in receiving notifications for feeds, use `[p]rssnotifier optin`
author: jack1142 (Jackenmen#6607)
